name: Orion Group Holdings, Inc.
description: Orion Group Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of construction and engineering services primarily focused on the marine, industrial, and commercial sectors. Established in 1977 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Orion offers a comprehensive range of services such as project management, engineering, procurement, and construction. The company specializes in complex projects that require innovative solutions and has built a strong reputation for quality and safety. Orion operates through various subsidiaries, including Orion Marine Group, which focuses on marine construction, and Orion Industrial, which provides industrial services. The company has worked on numerous high-profile projects including the construction of docks, piers, and other waterfront structures, as well as industrial facilities across the United States and internationally. Orion is committed to sustainable practices and ensuring environmental stewardship in all its operations. With a strong emphasis on teamwork and customer satisfaction, Orion is well-positioned to capitalize on growth opportunities in the construction industry while continuing to deliver exceptional results for its clients.

seo.meta_title: Orion Group Holdings, Inc. | Marine and Industrial Construction
seo.meta_description: Explore Orion Group Holdings, Inc., a leader in marine and industrial construction services. Learn about our projects, commitment to quality, and industry expertise.

faq.question: What services does Orion Group offer?
faq.answer: Orion Group offers marine construction, industrial services, project management, and engineering solutions.

faq.question: Where is Orion Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Orion Group is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: What industries does Orion Group serve?
faq.answer: Orion Group serves the marine, industrial, and commercial construction industries.
